text: Witold Stanisław Baran (29 July 1939 - 22 June 2020) was a Polish middle- distance runner. He was born in Chmielów, Ostrowiec County. He participated in the 1964 Summer Olympics, however he did not win any medals. He won a silver medal at the 1962 European Athletics Championships. Baran died on 22 June 2020 in Warsaw at the age of 80.Wielu Polaków pogrążyło się w żałobie. Związek przekazał najgorsze wieści, nie żyje Witold Baran ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympians for Poland Category:Polish middle-distance runners
title: Witold Baran
